item.title: About
item.description: Hi, my name is Thang Pham, aka aome. I’m currently a third-year student at University of Waterloo studying Computer Science. My current field of interest ranges from software development to robotics, automation, and embedded programming. I love building things and experimenting with new technology. My dream is to contribute to building a human-like robot that can make people’s lives better. I’m heavily inspired by my favorite childhood manga Doraemon. My motto is never stop learning to become a better version of myself everyday.
